entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Victoriaville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
